section.p: The following recommendations apply to the system that supports NPU maximum frequency of Wi-Fi frequency band:

entry.p: Refer to “EMC Mechanical Considerations” PDG chapter for example.
Reserve on-board shielding especially SOC area or core area
Ensure proper shielding ground contact for shielding effectiveness. Refer to “Shielding Ground Contact” PDG section under “On-Board Shielding” chapter for details.
Refer to “Antenna Barricade Technology” PDG section under EMC Mechanical Considerations chapter for more details.
Implement NPU power plane (VCCSA) RF decoupling capacitor placeholder
Refer to “RF Decoupling Capacitors on NPU Power Planes” PDG section for guidelines.
Minimize NPU power plane size (VCCSA) on top and bottom of the motherboard
